avrlibtypes.h

00001 
00005 //*****************************************************************************
00006 //
00007 // File Name    : 'avrlibtypes.h'
00008 // Title                : AVRlib global types and typedefines include file
00009 // Author               : Pascal Stang
00010 // Created              : 7/12/2001
00011 // Revised              : 9/30/2002
00012 // Version              : 1.0
00013 // Target MCU   : Atmel AVR series
00014 // Editor Tabs  : 4
00015 //
00016 //      Description : Type-defines required and used by AVRlib.  Most types are also
00017 //                                              generally useful.
00018 //
00019 // This code is distributed under the GNU Public License
00020 //              which can be found at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt
00021 //
00022 //*****************************************************************************
00023 
00024 
00025 #ifndef AVRLIBTYPES_H
00026 #define AVRLIBTYPES_H
00027 
00028 #ifndef WIN32
00029         // true/false defines
00030         #define FALSE   0
00031         #define TRUE    -1
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 // datatype definitions macros
00035 typedef unsigned char  u08;
00036 typedef   signed char  s08;
00037 typedef unsigned short u16;
00038 typedef   signed short s16;
00039 typedef unsigned long  u32;
00040 typedef   signed long  s32;
00041 typedef unsigned long long u64;
00042 typedef   signed long long s64;
00043 
00044 /* use inttypes.h instead
00045 // C99 standard integer type definitions
00046 typedef unsigned char   uint8_t;
00047 typedef   signed char   int8_t;
00048 typedef unsigned short  uint16_t;
00049 typedef   signed short  int16_t;
00050 typedef unsigned long   uint32_t;
00051 typedef   signed long   int32_t;
00052 typedef unsigned long   uint64_t;
00053 typedef   signed long   int64_t;
00054 */
00055 // maximum value that can be held
00056 // by unsigned data types (8,16,32bits)
00057 #define MAX_U08 255
00058 #define MAX_U16 65535
00059 #define MAX_U32 4294967295
00060 
00061 // maximum values that can be held
00062 // by signed data types (8,16,32bits)
00063 #define MIN_S08 -128
00064 #define MAX_S08 127
00065 #define MIN_S16 -32768
00066 #define MAX_S16 32767
00067 #define MIN_S32 -2147483648
00068 #define MAX_S32 2147483647
00069 
00070 #ifndef WIN32
00071         // more type redefinitions
00072         typedef unsigned char   BOOL;
00073         typedef unsigned char   BYTE;
00074         typedef unsigned int    WORD;
00075         typedef unsigned long   DWORD;
00076 
00077         typedef unsigned char   UCHAR;
00078         typedef unsigned int    UINT;
00079         typedef unsigned short  USHORT;
00080         typedef unsigned long   ULONG;
00081 
00082         typedef char                    CHAR;
00083         typedef int                             INT;
00084         typedef long                    LONG;
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #endif
